column4: Hi guys, I have to setup 14 computers in the same way, I know there is closed source software to clone a HD, and compy it on to other PCs but is there a GPL version that I could use! This is for my office call center
hmm thanks guys, I think the idea is that we have a copy of the entire HD, which is 4GBs so that we can restore the entire HD without having to download the packages
not 13 backups, I am setuping up 1 pc and i want it cloned to the other 13
if you pout the 2 hds on the different ide-bus and switch dma on, you can copy a 40G HD within 1h
